param.name: XC_P01
param.value: Skipped due to paused state of scan

DOCU_Docu.DOC:
= Action name = PCK.AUTOMIC_TENABLE_IO.PUB.ACTION.PAUSE_SCAN
= General Description = This action will pause a scan in Tenable.io.
= Inputs = - Scan ID* : Provide either Scan ID to pause scan. - Wait For Completion : Select Yes, to run action synchronously and No to run asynchronously. - Initial Waiting Time (in min) : Provide initial waiting time. E.g. 5 - Retry Count : Provide the number of retry attempts to get the status.E.g. 10 - Retry Interval (in sec): Provide the interval in seconds between retry attempt.E.g. 120
= Behaviour = This action will not work for web-app scan. If scan is already paused then this action will pass.
= Example = - Scan ID* : 42 - Wait For Completion : Yes - Initial Waiting Time (in min) : 5 - Retry Count : 10 - Retry Interval (in sec) : 120
